item.title: Report X-2024071661
item.description:
Report X-2024071661

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-31T21:13:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-16
  • City: COLBY
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DAMAGED DANGEROUS GOODS, PUT IN SALVAGE DRUM AND HELD AT COBY. FOUND ON BELT AFTER UNLOADED FROM TRAILER. PACKAGE WET ON OUTSIDE. UPON INSPECTION DURING DAMAGE REPORT IT WAS FOUND THAT THE CAPS OF TWO JUGS, EACH 5L, HAD LOOSE CAPS. TWO ADDITIONAL JUGS, TOTALING FOUR 5L JUGS, WERE PACKED INSIDE OF SEPERATE INTERNAL BOX WAS ALSO WET BUT CAPS WERE NOT LOOSE ON THOSE TWO JUGS.
